summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley between Blocks 11 and 12, Crown Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue West and 9th Avenue West, from West Galer Street to West Garfield Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6455 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
